column6: Comments
Two equal attacks countered the same way in a row
Didn’t need to attack for these last 3 touches
Missing the tip could be due to hitting with the arm not fully extended yet. Maybe having it a bit more extended at the point of the hit could be better.
Long attack at the end that I tried to parry
Fake acceleration to invite counter. It seems like at a long distance he will make a long fast attack and at a short distance he will do a fake acceleration.
To the flank
Long attack at the end that I tried to counter
Lunge closing 4 like always. Looks like he searches counter six before closing.
I synchronize my Ap with his search perfectly, except I don’t disengage and go straight into his parry (perfect timing for him - it was an invitation)
Why am I countering without hitting so much in these two bouts?
Another missed attack with a missed remise
Parry prime feint riposte to the back and riposte  to the chest with the hand up
He always parries a C6/prime
Finished the same way in the outside
Now I finished on the inside but still got countered
Attack to the back
Head
Falling down
Waited for him to remise but tried to parry again
He defended my Cc with distance
I rushed in the middle with my hand pulled going outside again
He defended my Cc with distance again
Long attack to the flank
Tried to jump parry
Defended my Cc with distance again (he was definetely inviting it)
But here I do the same thing and it’s my attack in the middle
I probably shouldn’t have countered again
I really don’t know why I missed the tip here
Should have riposted with disengage; he was ready for the parry. Maybe it was even second intention.
Looks like I’m pulling my arm or taking to long to finish in the middle
Looks like I’m pulling my arm or taking to long to finish in the middle
Have to work on my parry form
Tried to jump parry again
Ataque filippi
Middle again (I should have realized this ref was just always going to say I pull my arm; other refs didn’t call it the same way - its the ref with the bad leg)
Early C6 to the back
Definitely the wrong call
BF - Not the smartest decision
